summary: Created page with "[[File:Mika Brzezinski.webp|thumb|Mika Brzezinski]] Mika Brzezinski (born May 2, 1967) is an American liberal political commentator, author, and co-host of ''Morning Joe'' on MSNBC.   During 9/11 she was the main "Ground Zero" reporter for CBS. She joined MSNBC in 2007 and was later chosen as co-host of ''Morning Joe'', alongside Joe Scarborough.  Brzezinski is a visiting fellow at the Harvard Institute of Politics and her primary focus is wage equality. She has written..."
